summary: The customer was looking into why their bill was higher than usual and the agent explained that it was due to the addition of a new device to their plan. The agent then offered the customer several different packages and discounts that could potentially lower their monthly costs, such as a data package, international calling plans, and unlimited text messaging plans. These packages come with exclusive benefits such as free access to customer support and special discounts on select products and services. The customer should read all of the terms and conditions before signing up for one of these packages, as some may require an upfront payment.
